name: Holy Sheep (sylver, iPengin, Silver5478, ShazSupreme, SpectreVIX)
name_original: Holy Sheep (sylver, iPengin, Silver5478, ShazSupreme, SpectreVIX)
description:
Submission to Mini Jam 105: Dreamy

Limitation: Every Playthrough is Unique

Holy Sheep is a casual counting game in which you must count all of the sheep who have crossed the fence. Keep your eyes peeled!

Controls - Mouse to click

This 72-hour game jam served as a learning experience for most of the team, as it was their first time working with Unity.
